headline: Molson Coors outlook, Ralph Lauren price target, CommScope upgrade
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Josh Lipton tracks Tuesday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Molson Coors (TAP) lowered its full-year guidance, expecting underlying earnings per share to drop as much as 10% this year. Ralph Lauren (RL) stock's price target was boosted by Needham to $335 from $310, which sees the brand as well-positioned against broader macro headwinds. CommScope (COMM) stock climbs after getting upgrades from Morgan Stanley and Raymond James. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Ralph Lauren Q1 Earnings: Will Brand Strength Offset Macro Challenges?
summary: RL aims for strong Q1 earnings growth on brand strength and digital gains, but faces macro headwinds and FX volatility, which is likely to have pressured its performance.

headline: Zacks.com featured highlights Disney, BJ's Wholesale Club, Ralph Lauren and McKesson
summary: DIS, BJ, RL, and MCK boast strong interest coverage ratios, making them attractive picks in today's volatile market.
